wikipedia_page.main: John McDonald Dodds (10 January 1907 – 1982) was a Scottish amateur footballer who represented Great Britain at the 1936 Summer Olympics. Dodds played as a centre forward in the Scottish League for Queen's Park and represented Scotland at amateur level.
